sidebar.para: [[[kw-hos-phrase]]] supports the following hardware configurations for a deployment.

para.para: [[[kw-hos-phrase]]] supports Fibre Channel and FCoE boot from SAN in multipath environments. The following list outlines the current limitations based on testing:

listitem.para: Emulex based LPE1605 Native Fibre Channel - Up to 1024 paths during boot
Qlogic based SN100Q Native Fibre Channel - Up to 1024 paths during boot
Emulex Flex Fabric 650 series - Up to 1024 paths during boot
Emulex Flex Fabric 554FLB - Up to 1024 paths during boot
Qlogic Flex Fabric 536 and 630 series - Up to 1024 paths during boot
